Chloe Welch is a PhD student in the Division of Biological Sciences at the University of California, San Diego in La Jolla, CA. She holds a bachelor of science in cellular/molecular biology and a master's degree in stem cell biology. Her research interests are centered on cell and developmental biology with an emphasis on neurological disorders and disease.
